children.text: Click Here to Upload and Save a New Document

children.placeholderText: Document link will appear here after Minting
children.label: Document Link

children.tooltip: Your uploaded document will be saved by the name entered in the text box below.
children.placeholderText: Enter document name here after submitting document
children.label: Document Name

children.text:
1. Choose your document using the 'Select Document' button.

2. Submit the document using the 'Submit' button.

3. Enter document name in the 'Document Name' field.

4. Click 'Mint' button to save the document with the shown Document ID.

children.tooltip: A Unique ID assigned to your Minted Document.
children.label: Unique Document ID

children.placeholderText: Document link will appear here after Minting
children.label: Document Link

children.tooltip: Your uploaded document will be saved by the name entered in the text box below.
children.placeholderText: Enter document name here after submitting document
children.label: Document Name

children.text:
1. Choose your document using the 'Select Document' button.

2. Submit the document using the 'Submit' button.

3. Enter document name in the 'Document Name' field.

4. Click 'Mint' button to save the document with the shown Document ID.

children.tooltip: A Unique ID assigned to your Minted Document.
children.label: Unique Document ID

children.text:
1. Enter a Document ID shown with the "Your Document IDs" text.

2. Click "View Document" button to view your document.

3. You can Download and Copy Document URL by clicking the provided buttons.

children.tooltip: Enter the Document ID of the Uploaded Document you wish to view.
children.label: Enter Your Unique Document ID

children.text:
1. Enter a Document ID shown with the "Your Document IDs" text.

2. Click "View Document" button to view your document.

3. You can Download and Copy Document URL by clicking the provided buttons.

children.tooltip: Enter the Document ID of the Uploaded Document you wish to view.
children.label: Enter Your Unique Document ID
